column4: Can someone tell me what 'new in repository' means? Does this imply packages I need to install because they are an addition to packages allready installed?
they're simply new programs added to the repos
thnx. I just asked because I have no sound from my headphones and found an alsa-jack in the new in repository section...so I was just wondering if that would help
no, jack is a different sound server. I can see why it grabbed your eye, thoug
